data.message: Implement and refine Knowledge Graph feature for InterSphere: Built interactive /graph page with react-force-graph-2d. Features: click-to-expand nodes, hover tooltips, drag/zoom/pan, right-click to navigate, search to add topics, deep linking via URL params. Initial version used emojis and tight clustering. Refined after user feedback: removed emojis for clean initials, made text scale with zoom, increased node spacing. User loved the concept ("BOY"), requested iteration continues.
data.task: Implement and refine Knowledge Graph feature for InterSphere
